function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Persistent belief in miasma theory leading to stigmatization of urban poverty and unsanitary practices, contributing to the spread of contagious diseases.","Impact":"Contributes to the perpetuation of unsanitary conditions and the spread of contagious diseases in urban areas.","Mitigation":"Education and awareness campaigns to debunk miasma theory and promote understanding of the true causes of contagious diseases.","Technologies":"Public health communication tools, educational resources, and community engagement strategies.","People":"Urban residents, particularly those living in poverty-stricken areas.","Owner":"Public health organizations, local governments, educational institutions."}]}
